about_the_game:
This is the demo for Dungeon Exiles! Please note that this demo will be available until the approach of the June Steam Next Fest, where it will be taken down and replaced with a new and improved demo for the event.

Dungeon Exiles is an auto-battler roguelike where you can take command of the mighty Warrior, enigmatic Mage or cunning Rogue! Traverse the procedurally generated dungeons while uncovering powerful items and skills! Slay relentless horrors and conquer bosses as you carve your way to freedom in this dark roguelike!

Key Features
  • 3 Unique Classes
    Battle your way through the grim dungeon as the mighty Warrior, the cunning Rogue, or the enigmatic Mage!
  • 3 Floors Worth of Content
    Descend into the Dungeon, encountering swarths of unique enemies and bosses around every corner!
  • Procedurally Generated Maps
    Each Dungeon run will never feel the same! With randomly generated rooms and paths, each descent into the Dungeon is sure to feel unique!
  • Level up your Character
    In Dungeon Exiles each class has 30+ unique passives that you can choose from to craft your perfect character, but that's not all! As you level up, you can take your specialisation even further with the new trait and synergy system!
  • Powerful items and Loot
    Hidden in shops or in chests, you'll acquire powerful items to give your character the stats they need to survive the horrors of the Dungeon!
  • Random Events
    Engage with the dark world of Dungeon Exiles through random events. Choose how you want to handle and respond to each encounter with fate!

content_descriptors.notes: Dungeon Exiles features frequent dark fantasy violence in a pixel art style with the inclusion of some macabre themes such as undead (bones, blood, and corpses) and general horror and grotesque elements and may not be suitable for all audiences.

name: Dungeon Exiles Demo
short_description: Conquer the darkness in the Dungeon Exiles Demo, an autobattler roguelike set in a dark fantasy world. Descend into the procedurally generated dungeon, level up, unlock synergies and acquire powerful items as you fight for survival against the tides of darkness!
